alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 6:19AM AKST until January 12 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and periods of blizzard conditions. Total snow accumulations of 8 inches. Winds gusting to 60 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions will slowly improve on Friday as winds decrease.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
